 30712                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30713                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30714                                  ;
 30715                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30716                                  ;
 30717                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30718                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30719                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30720                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30721                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30722                                  ; Function:
 30723                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30724                                  ; Output:
 30725                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30726                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30727                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30728                                  ;
 30729                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30730                                  
 30731                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30732                                  IN_SC:
 30733                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30734                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30735                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30736                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30737                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30738                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30739                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30740                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30741                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30742                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30743                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30744                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30745                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30746                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30747                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30748                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30749                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30750                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30751                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30752                                  
 30753                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30754                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30755                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30756                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30757                                  
 30758                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30759                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30760                                  ;
 30761                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30762                                  ;
 30763                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30764                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30765                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30766                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30767                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30768                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30769                                  ;
 30770                                  ; Function:
 30771                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30772                                  ; Output:
 30773                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30774                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30775                                  
 30776                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30777                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30778                                  
 30779                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30780                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30781                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30782                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30783                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30784                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30785                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30786                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30788                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30789                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30790                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30791                                  
 30792                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30793                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30794                                  ;
 30795                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30796                                  ;
 30797                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30798                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30799                                  ; Function:
 30800                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30801                                  ; Output:
 30802                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30803                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30804                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30805                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30806                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30807                                  ;     
 30808                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30809                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30810                                  
 30811                                  VIRREAD:
 30812                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30813                                  
 30814                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30815                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30816                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30817                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30818                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30819                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30820                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30821                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30822                                  
 30823                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30824                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30825                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30826                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30827                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30828                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30829                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30830                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30831                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30832                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30833                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30834                                  	POP	CX
 30835                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30836                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30837                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30838                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30839                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30840                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30841                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30842                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30843                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30844                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30845                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30846                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30847                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30848                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30849                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30850                                  
 30851                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30852                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30853                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30854                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30855                                  
 30856                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30857                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30858                                  ;
 30859                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30860                                  ;
 30861                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30862                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30863                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30864                                  ; Function:
 30865                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30866                                  ; Output:
 30867                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30868                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30869                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30870                                  
 30871                                  SC2BUF:
 30872                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30873                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30874                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30875                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30876                                  	jc	short sexit
 30877                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30878                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30879                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30880                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30881                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30882                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30883                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30884                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30885                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30886                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30887                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30888                                  	mul	cx
 30889                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30890                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30891                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30892                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30893                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30894                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30895                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30896                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30897                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30898                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30899                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30900                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30901                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30902                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30903                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30904                                  nodd:
 30905                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30906                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30907                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30908                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30909                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30910                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30911                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30912                                  
 30913                                  %endif	; SC

 30924                                  
 30925                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 30926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30927                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 30928                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 30929                                  ;

 30941                                  ;
 30942                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988

 30944                                  
 30945                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30946                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30947                                  ;
 30948                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30949                                  ;
 30950                                  ; Inputs:
 30951                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30952                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30953                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30954                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30955                                  ;               entries
 30956                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30957                                  ; Function:
 30958                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30959                                  ; Outputs:
 30960                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30961                                  ;       ELSE
 30962                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30963                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30964                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30965                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30966                                  ;
 30967                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30968                                  
 30969                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30970                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30971                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30972                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30973                                  
 30974                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 30975                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 30976

 30990                                  	;retn

 31008                                  builddir_retn:

 31037 00005021 72DA                    	jc	short builddir_retn

 31045 0000502F 7515                    	JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 31046                                  	; 23/02/2024

 31057                                  	; 23/02/2024

 31060                                  	;

 31068                                  	;;;

 31070 0000505F 720C                    	JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 31071                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31072 00005061 891E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],BX

 31075                                  %if 0
 31076

 31090                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]

 31097                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31098                                  	;POP	CX
 31099                                  
 31100                                  %endif

 31103 00005069 8916[DE0A]              	mov	[CLUSNUM_HW],dx
 31104

 31106                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:

 31108 0000506F 30DB                    	XOR	BL,BL
 31109 00005071 E88805                  	call	FIGREC
 31110                                  GOTDIRREC:
 31111                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 31112 00005074 268A4E04                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 31113                                  	;INC	CL
 31114                                  	; 27/06/2024

 31116 00005079 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 31117                                  ZERODIR:
 31118 0000507B 51                      	PUSH    CX
 31119                                  	; 22/09/2023
 31120                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 31121                                  	;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 31122 0000507C B0FF                    	MOV	AL,0FFH
 31123                                  	;call	GETBUFFR
 31124 0000507E E8FE14                  	call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 31125 00005081 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 31126 00005083 59                      	POP	CX
 31127 00005084 C3                      	retn
 31128                                  
 31129                                  GET_SSIZE:
 31130                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 31131 00005085 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 31132 00005089 06                      	PUSH    ES
 31133 0000508A C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 31134                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 31135 0000508E 26804D0504              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 31136 00005093 57                      	PUSH    DI
 31137                                  	;;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 31138                                  	;;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 31139                                  	;add	di,24	; PCDOS 7.1 ; 23/02/2024

 31141 00005097 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 31142 00005099 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1
 31143 0000509B F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31144 0000509D 7301                    	JNC	short EVENZ
 31145 0000509F AA                      	STOSB
 31146                                  EVENZ:
 31147 000050A0 5F                      	POP	DI
 31148                                  
 31149                                  ; 23/02/2024
 31150                                  %if 0
 31151                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31152                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31153                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 31154                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 31155                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 31156                                  	
 31157                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31158                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31159                                  %else

 31161 000050A1 E86E17                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 31162                                  %endif
 31163                                  
 31164                                  yesdirty7:
 31165 000050A4 07                      	POP	ES
 31166 000050A5 59                      	POP	CX
 31167                                  
 31168                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31169

 31171                                  	;INC	DX
 31172                                  
 31173                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31174                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31175                                  	;add	dx,1
 31176                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 31177                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 31178                                  	;; ax=0
 31179                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 31180                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31181 000050A6 42                      	inc	dx
 31182 000050A7 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 31183 000050A9 FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 31184                                  loop_zerodir:
 31185 000050AD E2CC                    	LOOP	ZERODIR
 31186                                  
 31187 000050AF A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 31188 000050B2 40                      	INC	AX
 31189                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31190                                  	; cf=0
 31191                                  	;CLC
 31192 000050B3 C3                      	retn

 31194                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31195                                  ;
 31196                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31197                                  ;
 31198                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31199                                  ;
 31200                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31201                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31202                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31203                                  ;
 31204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31205                                  
 31206                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31207                                  
 31208                                  SETDOTENT:
 31209                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31210 000050B4 AB                      	STOSW
 31211 000050B5 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31212 000050B8 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31213 000050BB F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31214 000050BD AA                      	STOSB
 31215                                  
 31216                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31217                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31218 000050BE B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31219 000050C0 AA                      	STOSB
 31220                                  
 31221                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31222                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31223                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31224                                  	;;;
 31225 000050C1 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31226 000050C4 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31227 000050C7 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31228                                  	;;;	
 31229 000050C8 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31230                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31231 000050CC 8B440D                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31232 000050CF AB                      	STOSW
 31233                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31234 000050D0 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31235 000050D3 AB                      	STOSW
 31236                                  
 31237                                  ;	Set up first cluster field (lw)
 31238 000050D4 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31239 000050D6 AB                      	STOSW
 31240                                  
 31241                                  ;	0 file size
 31242                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31243 000050D7 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; 23/02/2024
 31244 000050D8 AB                      	STOSW
 31245 000050D9 AB                      	STOSW
 31246 000050DA C3                      	retn
 31247                                  
 31248                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31249                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31250                                  ;
 31251                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31252                                  ;
 31253                                  ; Inputs:
 31254                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31255                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31256                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31257                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31258                                  ;
 31259                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31260                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31261                                  ;
 31262                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31263                                  ;               terminated)
 31264                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31265                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31266                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31267                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31268                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31269                                  ; Function:
 31270                                  ;       Make a new node
 31271                                  ; Outputs:
 31272                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31273                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31274                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31275                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31276                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31277                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31278                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31279                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31280                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31281                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31282                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31283                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31284                                  ;       ELSE
 31285                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31286                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31287                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31288                                  ;               containing new node.
 31289                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31290                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31291                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31292                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31293                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31294                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31295                                  ;
 31296                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31297                                  
 31298                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31299                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31300                                  
 31301                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31302                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31303                                  
 31304                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31305                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31306                                  
 31307                                  MakeNode:
 31308                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31309 000050DB C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31310 000050E1 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31311 000050E2 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31312 000050E7 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31313 000050EA E893F8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31314 000050ED 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31315                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31316                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31317 000050EF 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31318 000050F0 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31319 000050F1 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31320 000050F3 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31321 000050F5 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31322 000050F8 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31323                                  make_err_4:
 31324 000050FA B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31325                                  make_err_ret:
 31326                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31327                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31328 000050FC 98                      	cbw
 31329 000050FD F9                      	STC
 31330                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31331 000050FE C3                      	retn
 31332                                  
 31333                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31334                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31335                                  make_type:
 31336                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31337                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31338                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31339 000050FF F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31340 00005104 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31341 00005106 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31342                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31343                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31344 0000510B F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31345 00005110 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31346 00005112 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31347 00005113 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31348                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31349                                  make_retn:
 31350                                  	;return
 31351 00005116 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31352                                  
 31353                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31354                                  
 31355                                  make_type2:
 31356 00005117 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31357 0000511B 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31358 0000511D F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31359 0000511E EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31360                                  
 31361                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31362                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31363                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31364                                  ;   else => file
 31365                                  
 31366                                  make_exists:
 31367 00005120 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31368 00005122 B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31369                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31370 00005124 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31371 00005129 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31372                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31373                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31374 0000512B 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31375 0000512D 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31376 0000512F 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31377 00005131 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31378 00005133 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31379 00005134 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31380                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31381 00005138 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31382                                  	;test	ch,1
 31383 0000513C F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31384 0000513F 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 31385 00005141 E858FA                  	call	MatchAttributes
 31386 00005144 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31387 00005145 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31388 00005147 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31389                                  make_share:
 31390                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31391                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31392 00005149 98                      	cbw

 31483 000051A7 58                      	POP	AX
 31484 000051A8 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31485                                  
 31486                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31487                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31488                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31489                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31490                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31491                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31492                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31493                                  ;
 31494                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31495                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31496                                  
 31497                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31498                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31499                                  
 31500                                  MakeEndShare:

 31513 000051BF 5F                      	pop	di

 31515                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]

 31519 000051C6 5B                      	pop	bx
 31520 000051C7 5E                      	pop	si
 31521 000051C8 59                      	pop	cx
 31522 000051C9 58                      	pop	ax
 31523 000051CA E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save

 31525                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31526

 31543                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31544                                  ;
 31545                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31546                                  ;
 31547                                  ; Inputs:
 31548                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31549                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31550                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31551                                  ;		  entries
 31552                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31553                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31554                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31555                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31556                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31557                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31558                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31559                                  ;	  If FILE
 31560                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31561                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31562                                  ;	  If device
 31563                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31564                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31565                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31566                                  ; Function:
 31567                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31568                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31569                                  ; Outputs:
 31570                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31571                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31572                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31573                                  ;	  else
 31574                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31575                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31576                                  ;
 31577                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31578                                  
 31579                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31580                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31581                                  
 31582                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31583                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31584                                  
 31585                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31586                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)

 31731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31732                                  ;
 31733                                  ; Inputs:
 31734                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31735                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31736                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31737                                  ;	  If FILE

 31739                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31740                                  ;	  If device

 31742                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31743                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31744                                  ; Function:
 31745                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31746                                  ; Outputs:
 31747                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31748                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31749                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31750                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31751                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31752                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31753                                  ;	  sf_position = 0

 31756                                  ;	  sf_size = 0

 31759                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31760                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0

 32032                                  ;
 32033                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32034                                  ;
 32035                                  ; Inputs:
 32036                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32037                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32038                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32039                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32040                                  ; Function:
 32041                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32042                                  ; Outputs:
 32043                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32044                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32045                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32046                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32047                                  
 32048                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 32142                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32143                                  ;
 32144                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32145                                  ;
 32146                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32147                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32148                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32149                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32150                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32151                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32152                                  ;
 32153                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32154                                  
 32155                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32156                                  	PUSH	AX
 32157                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32158                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32159                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32160                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32161                                  	push	es
 32162                                  	push	di
 32163                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32164                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32165                                  	pop	di
 32166                                  	pop	es
 32167                                  
 32168                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32169                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32170                                  	POP	AX
 32171                                  	retn
 32172                                  
 32173                                  %endif

 32208                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32209                                  ;
 32210                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32211                                  ;
 32212                                  ; Inputs:
 32213                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 32214                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32215                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 32216                                  ; Outputs:
 32217                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 32218                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 32219                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 32220                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32221                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 32222                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32342                                  %else
 32343                                  	;;;
 32344                                  	; 10/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32345                                  
 32346                                  	;push	word [LASTPOS_HW]
 32347                                  	;push	dx
 32348                                  	;push	word [CLSKIP_HW]

 32350

 32352                                  
 32353                                  	;pop	cx
 32354                                  	;pop	word [CLSKIP_HW]
 32355                                  	;pop	dx
 32356                                  	;pop	word [LASTPOS_HW]
 32357                                  	
 32358 00005404 7242                    	jc	short fndclus_retn
 32359                                  
 32360 00005406 FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32361 0000540A 53                      	push	bx

 32363 0000540D 8B3E[EC0A]              	mov	di,[CCONTENT_HW]
 32364 00005411 893E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],di
 32365 00005415 E8F40A                  	call	IsEOF
 32366 00005418 7206                    	jc	short SKPCLP2
 32367 0000541A 5B                      	pop	bx
 32368 0000541B 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32369                                  	;jmp	short RET9

 32371 0000541F C3                      	retn
 32372                                  
 32373                                  SKPCLP2:
 32374 00005420 83C404                  	add	sp,4

 32427                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32428                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32429                                  ;
 32430                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32431                                  ;
 32432                                  ; Inputs:
 32433                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32434                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32435                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32436                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32437                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32438                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32439                                  ; Function:
 32440                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32441                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32442                                  ; Outputs:
 32443                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32444                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32445                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32446                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32447                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32448                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32449                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32450                                  
 32451                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32452                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32453                                  
 32454                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32455                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32456                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32457                                  
 32458                                  BUFSEC:
 32459                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32460                                  	;;;
 32461                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32462 00005449 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32463                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32464 0000544D 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32465 00005451 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32466                                  	;;;
 32467 00005452 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32468 00005456 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32469                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 32470 0000545A C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 32471 0000545F E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 32472 00005462 E81F11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 32473                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32474                                  	;;;
 32475 00005465 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32476                                  	;;;
 32477 00005469 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 32478                                  
 32479 0000546B C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 32480 00005470 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32481 00005474 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32482 00005476 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 32483 0000547A 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 32484 0000547C 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 32485 00005480 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 32486                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 32487 00005484 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 32488                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 32489                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32490                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 32491 00005489 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 32492 0000548C 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 32493 00005490 F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 32494 00005491 C3                              retn
 32495                                  
 32496                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 32497                                  
 32498                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32499                                  ;
 32500                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 32501                                  ;
 32502                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 32503                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32504                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32505                                  ;
 32506                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 32507                                  ;
 32508                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32509                                  
 32510                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32511                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32512                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32513                                  BUFRD:
 32514 00005492 06                              PUSH	ES
 32515 00005493 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector
 32516 00005495 E8B1FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 32517 00005498 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 32518                                  
 32519                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 32520 0000549A 07                              POP	ES
 32521 0000549B EB2D                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED ; ds=ss
 32522                                  
 32523                                  BUF_OK:
 32524 0000549D 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 32525 0000549F 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 32526 000054A3 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 32527 000054A5 87F7                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 32528 000054A7 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 32529                                  ;M039
 32530                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32531                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 32532                                  	;MOVSB
 32533                                  ;EVENRD:
 32534                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 32535                                  
 32536                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 32537                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 32538                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 32539                                  
 32540                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32541 000054A9 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 32542                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 32543                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 32544                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32545 000054AB 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 32546 000054AD A4                      	movsb ; ****
 32547                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32548                                  	;adc	cx,0
 32549                                  	;rep	movsb
 32550                                  ;M039
 32551                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 32552 000054AE 07                              POP	ES
 32553                                  ;hkn; SS override
 32554 000054AF 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 32555                                  	;;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 32556                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32557                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1	; 25/02/2024
 32558 000054B4 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 32559 000054B7 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 32560 000054B9 E86A10                          call	PLACEBUF
 32561                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 32562 000054BC 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 32563 000054C0 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 32564                                  ;M039
 32565                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32566                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 32567                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 32568                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 32569 000054C2 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 32570                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 32571                                  
 32572                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 32573 000054C7 F8                              CLC
 32574                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 32575 000054C8 16                      	push	ss
 32576 000054C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 32577                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 32578 000054CA C3                              retn
 32579

 32583                                  ;
 32584                                  ; Do a partial sector write via one of the system buffers

 32587                                  ;

 32772                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32774                                  ;
 32775                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32776                                  ;
 32777                                  ; Inputs:
 32778                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 32779                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 32780                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 32781                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32782                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 32783                                  ; Outputs:
 32784                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining
 32785                                  ;	  BX = Transfer address
 32786                                  ;	  CX = No. or records to be transferred
 32787                                  ;	  DX = Physical sector address (LOW)
 32788                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 32789                                  ;	  DI = Next cluster
 32790                                  ;	  [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 32791                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] updated
 32792                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32793                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 32794                                  ;
 32795                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32796                                  
 32797                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32798                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32799                                  
 32800                                  OPTIMIZE:
 32801 0000556D 52                      	PUSH	DX
 32802                                  	; 27/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32803                                  	;;;
 32804 0000556E FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32805                                  	;;;
 32806 00005572 53                      	PUSH	BX
 32807                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 32808 00005573 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 32809 00005577 FEC0                    	INC	AL		; Number of sectors per cluster
 32810 00005579 88C4                    	MOV	AH,AL
 32811 0000557B 28D0                    	SUB	AL,DL		; AL = Num of sectors left in first cluster
 32812 0000557D 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 32813                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 32814                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32815                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32816 0000557F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 32817                                  OPTCLUS:
 32818                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 32819                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 32820                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 32821                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 32822                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 32823                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32824                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer
 32825                                  
 32826                                  do_norm3:
 32827 00005581 E8B109                  	call	UNPACK
 32828 00005584 7263                    	JC	short OP_ERR	; ds=ss ; 27/02/2024
 32829                                  ;clusgot2:

 33044                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33045                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33046                                  
 33047                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33048                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset
 33049                                  
 33050                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33051                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33052                                  ;
 33053                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33054                                  ;
 33055                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33056                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33057                                  ;
 33058                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33059                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33060                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33061                                  ;
 33062                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33063                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33064                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33065                                  ;
 33066                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33067                                  ;
 33068                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33069                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33070                                  ;           ELSE
 33071                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33072                                  ;
 33073                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33074                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33075                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33076                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33077                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33078                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33079                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33080                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33081                                  ;   allocated.
 33082                                  ;
 33083                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33084                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33085                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33086                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33087                                  ;
 33088                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33089                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33090                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33091                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33092                                  ;   explanation:
 33093                                  ;
 33094                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33095                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33096                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33097                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33098                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33099                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33100                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33101                                  ;   the
 33102                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33103                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33104                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33105                                  ;
 33106                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33107                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33108                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33109                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33110                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33111                                  ;
 33112                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33113                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33114                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33115                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33116                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33117                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33118                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33119                                  ;
 33120                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33121                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33122                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33123                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33124                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33125                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33126                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null
 33127                                  ;
 33128                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP
 33129                                  
 33130                                  ;callmagic  proc near
 33131                                  ;       push    ds                             ;push segment of routine 
 33132                                  ;       push    Offset MagicPatch              ;push offset for routine
 33133                                  ;       retf                                   ;simulate jmp far
 33134                                  ;                                              ;far return address is on
 33135                                  ;                                              ;stack, so far return from
 33136                                  ;                                              ;call will return this routine
 33137                                  ;callmagic  endp
 33138                                  
 33139                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33140                                  ;PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9AC5h
 33141                                  
 33142                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC2h)
 33143                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C078h)
 33144                                  
 33145                                  ; 07/03/2025
 33146                                  ; 25/09/2023
 33147                                  %if 0	; 27/02/2024
 33148                                  callmagic:
 33149                                  	push	ds
 33150                                  	push	word [ss:OffsetMagicPatch]
 33151                                  	retf	
 33152                                  %endif
 33153

 33155                                  %if 1
 33156                                  ALLOCATE_X:
 33157 00005634 A3[F00A]                	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],ax
 33158                                  	;jmp	short ALLOCATE
 33159                                  %endif

 33162                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9ACFh
 33163                                  
 33164                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC9h)

 33166
