 33764                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33765                                  ;
 33766                                  ; Procedure Name : RELEASE
 33767                                  ;
 33768                                  ; Inputs:
 33769                                  ;       BX = Cluster in file
 33770                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33771                                  ; Function:
 33772                                  ;       Frees cluster chain starting with [BX]
 33773                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33774                                  ; AX,BX,DX,DI all destroyed. Other registers unchanged.
 33775                                  ;
 33776                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33777                                  
 33778                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33779                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D13h
 33780                                  
 33781                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E86h)
 33782                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C27Fh)
 33783                                  
 33784                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33785                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33786                                  RELEASE:
 33787 00005824 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 33788                                  	
 33789                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33790                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33791                                  	;;;
 33792 00005826 8916[EA0A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx ; (dx = 0, release)
 33793                                  	;;;
 33794                                  
 33795                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D19h
 33796                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E88h)
 33797                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C285h)
 33798                                  
 33799                                  	;entry	RELBLKS
 33800                                  RELBLKS:
 33801                                  
 33802                                  ;   Enter here with DX=0FFFFH to put an end-of-file mark in the first cluster
 33803                                  ;   and free the rest in the chain.
 33804                                  
 33805 0000582A E80807                  	call	UNPACK
 33806                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33807                                  	;jz	short RELEASE_flush
 33808                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33809 0000582D 7652                            jbe	short RET12 ; jna short RET12
 33810                                  				; CCONTENT_HW:DI= Content of FAT
 33811                                   				; for given cluster (next cluster)
 33812 0000582F 89F8                    	MOV     AX,DI
 33813 00005831 52                              PUSH    DX
 33814                                  
 33815                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33816                                  	;push	ax
 33817                                  	;;;
 33818                                  
 33819 00005832 E8AF07                  	call	PACK
 33820                                  
 33821                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33822                                  	;pop	ax
 33823 00005835 8B16[EC0A]              	mov	dx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33824 00005839 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; next cluster (hw) to be released
 33825 0000583D 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax		 ; next cluster (lw) to be released
 33826                                  	;;;
 33827                                          
 33828 0000583F 5A                      	POP     DX
 33829                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33830                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33831 00005840 723F                    	jc	short RET12
 33832                                          
 33833 00005842 09D2                    	OR      DX,DX
 33834 00005844 751F                            JNZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; Was putting EOF mark
 33835                                  
 33836                                  ; 28/02/2024
 33837                                  %if 0
 33838                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1 ; MSDOS 3.3
 33839                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 33840                                  	CMP     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 33841                                          JZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; No
 33842                                          INC	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33843                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33844                                          MOV     BX,AX
 33845                                          dec     ax              	; check for "1"
 33846                                  	jz	short RELEASE_flush	; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33847                                  %else
 33848                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33849                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33850                                  	;;;
 33851 00005846 3B16[EA0A]              	cmp	dx,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; > 0 ? (delete, release)
 33852 0000584A 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC	; no, EOF (allocate, -1), (dx = 0)
 33853                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 33854 0000584C 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 33855                                  					; Free count valid?
 33856 00005851 7412                    	jz	short NO_DEALLOC	; No (dx = 0)
 33857                                  relblks_ifc:
 33858                                  	;inc	word ptr es:[bp+1Fh]
 33859 00005853 26FF461F                	inc	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33860 00005857 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33861                                  
 33862                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33863 00005859 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx
 33864 0000585D 7513                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2	; not FAT32
 33865                                  
 33866                                  	;inc	word [es:bp+21h]
 33867 0000585F 26FF4621                	inc	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 33868 00005863 EB0D                    	jmp	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33869                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33870                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33871 00005865 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx	; dx is -1 or 0
 33872                                  					; (valid 16 bit fat size is another number)
 33873 00005869 7507                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2 ; FAT (FAT16 or FAT12)
 33874                                  					; dx = 0, FAT32
 33875                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh
 33876 0000586B 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh
 33877 00005870 75E1                    	jnz	short relblks_ifc
 33878                                  NO_DEALLOC2:
 33879 00005872 833E[E80A]00            	cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 33880 00005877 7503                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC3
 33881 00005879 48                      	dec	ax			; check for "1"	
 33882 0000587A 7405                    	jz	short RET12		; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33883                                  NO_DEALLOC3:
 33884                                  	;;;
 33885                                  %endif
 33886                                  
 33887 0000587C E88D06                  	call	IsEOF
 33888 0000587F 72A3                            JB	short RELEASE	; Carry clear if JMP not taken
 33889                                  
 33890                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33891                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33892                                  ; 28/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33893                                  %if 0
 33894                                  RELEASE_flush:
 33895                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33896                                  	mov	al,[es:bp]
 33897                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 33898                                  	push	si		; FLUSHBUF may trash these and we guarantee
 33899                                  	push	cx		;  them to be preserved.
 33900                                  	push	es
 33901                                  	push	bp
 33902                                  	call	FLUSHBUF	; commit buffers for this drive
 33903                                  	pop	bp
 33904                                  	pop	es
 33905                                  	pop	cx
 33906                                  	pop	si
 33907                                  %endif		; 28/02/2024
 33908                                  
 33909                                  RET12:
 33910 00005881 C3                      	retn
 33911                                  
 33912                                  ;Break	<GETEOF -- Find the end of a file>
 33913                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33914                                  ;
 33915                                  ; Procedure Name : GETEOF
 33916                                  ;
 33917                                  ; Inputs:
 33918                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 33919                                  ;       BX = Cluster in a file
 33920                                  ;       DS = CS
 33921                                  ; Outputs:
 33922                                  ;       BX = Last cluster in the file
 33923                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33924                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 33925                                  ;
 33926                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33927                                  
 33928                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33929                                  %if 0
 33930                                  GETEOF:
 33931                                  	call	UNPACK
 33932                                          jc	short RET12
 33933                                          PUSH    BX
 33934                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33935                                  	call	IsEOF
 33936                                          POP     BX
 33937                                          JAE     short RET12
 33938                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33939                                          JMP     short GETEOF
 33940                                  %else
 33941                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33942                                  	;;;
 33943                                  GETEOF4:	; **
 33944 00005882 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33945                                  GETEOF1:
 33946 00005886 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 33947 00005888 8916[F20A]              	mov	[CLUSTERS_HW],dx ; CLUSTERS_HW:DI = Cluster Count
 33948 0000588C 58                      	pop	ax
 33949 0000588D 5A                      	pop	dx
 33950 0000588E C3                      	retn
 33951                                  
 33952                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D7Ch
 33953                                  GETEOF:
 33954 0000588F 52                      	push	dx
 33955 00005890 50                      	push	ax
 33956 00005891 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx ; 0	; cluster count = 0
 33957 00005893 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33958                                  GETEOF2:
 33959 00005895 E89D06                  	call	UNPACK
 33960 00005898 72EC                    	jc	short GETEOF1
 33961                                  		; CCONTENT_HW:DI = next cluster (cluster content)
 33962 0000589A 40                      	inc	ax
 33963 0000589B 7501                    	jnz	short GETEOF3
 33964 0000589D 42                      	inc	dx
 33965                                  GETEOF3:
 33966 0000589E FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33967 000058A2 53                      	push    bx
 33968                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33969 000058A3 8B1E[EC0A]              	mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33970 000058A7 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33971 000058AB 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33972 000058AD E85C06                  	call	IsEOF
 33973                                  	;pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33974 000058B0 5B                      	pop	bx
 33975                                  	;jae	short GETEOF1   ; EOF
 33976 000058B1 73CF                    	jae	short GETEOF4 ; ** ; 28/02/2024
 33977                                  	;mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW] ; not EOF
 33978                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33979 000058B3 5B                      	pop	bx	; * ; 28/02/2024
 33980 000058B4 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33981 000058B6 EBDD                    	jmp	short GETEOF2   ; get next cluster
 33982                                  	;;;
 33983                                  %endif

 34023                                  ;
 34024                                  ; Procedure : MakeFcb
 34025                                  ;
 34026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34027                                  
 34028                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34029                                  	; DOSCODE:8E77h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34030                                  
 34031                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34032                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9DB0h
 34033                                  
 34034                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8ED3h)
 34035                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8D92h)
 34036                                  
 34037                                  MAKEFCB:
 34038                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34039                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0
 34040 000058B8 30D2                    	XOR	DL,DL		; Flag--not ambiguous file name
 34041                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34042 000058BA 368816[4E03]            	mov	[ss:SpaceFlag],dl ; 0
 34043                                  	;test	al,2
 34044 000058BF A802                    	test	AL,DRVBIT	; Use current drive field if default?
 34045 000058C1 7503                    	JNZ	short DEFDRV
 34046                                  	;MOV	BYTE [ES:DI],0	; No - use default drive
 34047                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34048 000058C3 268815                  	mov	[es:di],dl ; 0
 34049                                  DEFDRV:
 34050 000058C6 47                      	INC	DI
 34051 000058C7 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34052                                  	;test	al,4
 34053 000058CA A804                    	test	AL,NAMBIT	; Use current name fields as default?
 34054 000058CC 93                      	XCHG	AX,BX		; Save bits in BX
 34055 000058CD B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34056 000058CF 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB	; If not, go fill with blanks
 34057 000058D1 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34058 000058D3 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; Don't fill any
 34059                                  FILLB:
 34060 000058D5 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34061 000058D7 B103                    	MOV	CL,3
 34062 000058D9 F6C308                  	test	BL,EXTBIT	; Use current extension as default
 34063 000058DC 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB2
 34064 000058DE 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34065 000058E0 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX
 34066                                  FILLB2:
 34067 000058E2 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34068 000058E4 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX		; Put zero in AX
 34069 000058E5 AB                      	STOSW
 34070 000058E6 AB                      	STOSW			; Initialize two words after to zero
 34071 000058E7 83EF10                  	SUB	DI,16		; Point back at start
 34072                                  	;test	bl,1
 34073 000058EA F6C301                  	test	BL,SCANSEPARATOR; Scan off separators if not zero
 34074 000058ED 7409                    	JZ	short SKPSPC
 34075 000058EF E88800                  	CALL	SCANB		; Peel off blanks and tabs
 34076 000058F2 E81E01                  	CALL	DELIM		; Is it a one-time-only delimiter?
 34077 000058F5 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSCAN
 34078 000058F7 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over the delimiter
 34079                                  SKPSPC:
 34080 000058F8 E87F00                  	CALL	SCANB		; Always kill preceding blanks and tabs
 34081                                  NOSCAN:
 34082 000058FB E8EC00                  	CALL	GETLET
 34083 000058FE 761E                    	JBE	short NODRV	; Quit if termination character
 34084 00005900 803C3A                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],":"	; Check for potential drive specifier
 34085 00005903 7519                    	JNZ	short NODRV
 34086 00005905 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over colon
 34087 00005906 2C40                    	SUB	AL,"@"          ; Convert drive letter to drive number (A=1)
 34088 00005908 760F                    	JBE	short BADDRV	; Drive letter out of range
 34089                                  
 34090 0000590A 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34091 0000590B E8961E                  	call	GetVisDrv
 34092 0000590E 58                      	POP	AX
 34093 0000590F 730A                    	JNC	short HAVDRV
 34094                                  
 34095                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34096                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34097                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34098 00005911 36803E[1006]1A          	CMP	byte [SS:DrvErr],error_not_DOS_disk ; 1Ah
 34099                                  					; if not FAT drive ;AN000;
 34100 00005917 7402                    	JZ	short HAVDRV		; assume ok	   ;AN000;
 34101                                  BADDRV:
 34102 00005919 B2FF                    	MOV	DL,-1
 34103                                  HAVDRV:
 34104 0000591B AA                      	STOSB			; Put drive specifier in first byte
 34105 0000591C 46                      	INC	SI
 34106 0000591D 4F                      	DEC	DI		; Counteract next two instructions
 34107                                  NODRV:
 34108 0000591E 4E                      	DEC	SI		; Back up
 34109 0000591F 47                      	INC	DI		; Skip drive byte
 34110                                  
 34111                                  	;entry	NORMSCAN
 34112                                  NORMSCAN:
 34113 00005920 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34114 00005923 E82200                  	CALL	GETWORD 	; Get 8-letter file name
 34115 00005926 803C2E                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],"."
 34116 00005929 7510                    	JNZ	short NODOT
 34117 0000592B 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over dot if present
 34118                                  
 34119                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34120                                  	;mov	cx,3
 34121 0000592C B103                    	mov	cl,3	; ch=0
 34122                                  
 34123                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34124                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34125                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID2 ; 100h ;AN000;
 34126                                  	; 10/06/2019
 34127 0000592E 36F606[1206]01          	test	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(DBCS_VOLID2>>8) ; 1
 34128 00005934 7402                    	JZ	short VOLOK				;AN000;
 34129 00005936 A4                      	MOVSB			; 2nd byte of DBCS	;AN000;
 34130                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34131                                  	;MOV	CX,2					;AN000;
 34132 00005937 49                      	dec	cx  ; cx=2
 34133                                  	;JMP	SHORT contvol				;AN000;
 34134                                  VOLOK:
 34135                                  	;MOV	CX,3		; Get 3-letter extension
 34136                                  contvol:
 34137 00005938 E81300                  	CALL	MUSTGETWORD
 34138                                  NODOT:
 34139 0000593B 88D0                    	MOV	AL,DL
 34140                                  
 34141                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34142                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],0FEFFh
 34143                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34144 0000593D 368026[1206]FE          	and	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],0FEh ; (~DBCS_VOLID2)>>8
 34145                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],~DBCS_VOLID2 ; ### BUG FIX ###
 34146                                  
 34147 00005943 C3                      	retn
 34148                                  
 34149                                  NONAM:
 34150 00005944 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34151 00005946 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34152 00005947 C3                      	retn
 34153                                  
 34154                                  GETWORD:
 34155 00005948 E89F00                  	CALL	GETLET		
 34156 0000594B 76F7                    	JBE	short NONAM	; Exit if invalid character
 34157 0000594D 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34158                                  
 34159                                  ;	UGH!!! Horrible bug here that should be fixed at some point:
 34160                                  ;	If the name we are scanning is longer than CX, we keep on reading!
 34161                                  
 34162                                  MUSTGETWORD:
 34163 0000594E E89900                  	CALL	GETLET
 34164                                  
 34165                                  ;	If spaceFlag is set then we allow spaces in a pathname
 34166                                  
 34167                                  ;IF NOT TABLELOOK
 34168                                  ;	JB	short FILLNAM  ; MSDOS 3.3
 34169                                  ;ENDIF
 34170 00005951 750C                    	JNZ	short MustCheckCX
 34171                                  
 34172                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34173 00005953 36F606[4E03]FF          	test	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0FFh
 34174 00005959 7419                    	JZ	short FILLNAM
 34175 0000595B 3C20                    	CMP	AL," "
 34176 0000595D 7515                    	JNZ	short FILLNAM
 34177                                  
 34178                                  MustCheckCX:
 34179 0000595F E3ED                    	JCXZ	MUSTGETWORD
 34180 00005961 49                      	DEC	CX
 34181 00005962 3C2A                    	CMP	AL,"*"          ; Check for ambiguous file specifier
 34182 00005964 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSTAR
 34183 00005966 B03F                    	MOV	AL,"?"
 34184 00005968 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34185                                  NOSTAR:
 34186 0000596A AA                      	STOSB
 34187 0000596B 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?"
 34188 0000596D 75DF                    	JNZ	short MUSTGETWORD
 34189 0000596F 80CA01                  	OR	DL,1		; Flag ambiguous file name
 34190 00005972 EBDA                    	JMP	short MUSTGETWORD
 34191                                  FILLNAM:
 34192 00005974 B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34193 00005976 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34194 00005978 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34195 00005979 C3                      	retn
 34196                                  
 34197                                  SCANB:
 34198 0000597A AC                      	LODSB
 34199 0000597B E89D00                  	CALL	SPCHK
 34200 0000597E 74FA                    	JZ	short SCANB
 34201 00005980 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34202                                  scanb_retn:
 34203 00005981 C3                      	retn

 34205                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34206                                  ;
 34207                                  ; Procedure Name : NameTrans
 34208                                  ;
 34209                                  ; NameTrans is used by FindPath to scan off an element of a path. We must
 34210                                  ; allow spaces in pathnames
 34211                                  ;
 34212                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI points to start of path element
 34213                                  ;   Outputs:	Name1 has unpacked name, uppercased
 34214                                  ;		ES = DOSGroup
 34215                                  ;		DS:SI advanced after name
 34216                                  ;   Registers modified: DI,AX,DX,CX
 34217                                  ;
 34218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34219                                  
 34220                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34221                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34222                                  
 34223                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34224                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9E7Ch
 34225                                  
 34226                                  NameTrans:
 34227                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34228 00005982 36C606[4E03]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],1
 34229 00005988 16                      	push	ss
 34230 00005989 07                      	pop	es
 34231                                  
 34232                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 34233 0000598A BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 34234 0000598D 57                      	PUSH	DI
 34235                                  
 34236                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34237                                  %if 0
 34238                                  	MOV	AX,'  '	; 2020h
 34239                                  	MOV	CX,5
 34240                                  	STOSB
 34241                                  	REP	STOSW		; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34242                                  	XOR	AL,AL		; Set stuff for NORMSCAN
 34243                                  	MOV	DL,AL
 34244                                  %else
 34245                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34246                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34247                                  	;;;
 34248 0000598E B020                    	mov     al, 20h ; ' '
 34249 00005990 B90B00                  	mov     cx, 11
 34250 00005993 F3AA                    	rep stosb               ; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34251 00005995 91                      	xchg    ax, cx
 34252 00005996 99                      	cwd
 34253                                  	;;;
 34254                                  %endif
 34255                                  
 34256 00005997 AA                      	STOSB
 34257 00005998 5F                      	POP	DI
 34258                                  
 34259 00005999 E884FF                  	CALL	NORMSCAN
 34260                                  
 34261                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 34262 0000599C 36803E[4B05]E5          	CMP	byte [SS:NAME1],0E5H
 34263 000059A2 75DD                    	jnz	short scanb_retn
 34264 000059A4 36C606[4B05]05          	MOV	byte [SS:NAME1],5 ; Magic name translation
 34265 000059AA C3                      	retn

 34270                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34271                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34272                                  
 34273                                  ;If TableLook
 34274                                  
 34275                                  ;hkn; Table	SEGMENT
 34276                                  ;	PUBLIC	CharType
 34277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34278                                  
 34279                                  ; Character type table for file name scanning
 34280                                  ; Table provides a mapping of characters to validity bits.
 34281                                  ; Four bits are provided for each character. Values 7Dh and above
 34282                                  ; have all bits set, so that part of the table is chopped off, and
 34283                                  ; the translation routine is responsible for screening these values.
 34284                                  ; The bit values are defined in DOSSYM.INC
 34285                                  
 34286                                  ;	      ; ^A and NUL
 34287                                  ;CharType:
 34288                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34289                                  ;	      ; ^C and ^B
 34290                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34291                                  ;	      ; ^E and ^D
 34292                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34293                                  ;	      ; ^G and ^F
 34294                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34295                                  ;	      ; TAB and BS
 34296                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34297                                  ;	      ; ^K and ^J
 34298                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34299                                  ;	      ; ^M and ^L
 34300                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34301                                  ;	      ; ^O and ^N
 34302                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34303                                  ;	      ; ^Q and ^P
 34304                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34305                                  ;	      ; ^S and ^R
 34306                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34307                                  ;	      ; ^U and ^T
 34308                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34309                                  ;	      ; ^W and ^V
 34310                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34311                                  ;	      ; ^Y and ^X
 34312                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34313                                  ;	      ; ESC and ^Z
 34314                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34315                                  ;	      ; ^] and ^;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34317                                  ;	      ; ^_ and ^^
 34318                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34319                                  ;	      ; ! and SPACE
 34320                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK)
 34321                                  ;	      ; # and "
 34322                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK)
 34323                                  ;	      ; $ - )
 34324                                  ;	 db   3 dup (0FFh)
 34325                                  ;	      ; + and *
 34326                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34327                                  ;	      ; - and '
 34328                                  ;	 db   NOT (FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM)
 34329                                  ;	      ; / and .
 34330                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34331                                  ;	      ; 0 - 9
 34332                                  ;	 db   5 dup (0FFh)
 34333                                  ;	      ; ; and :
 34334                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34335                                  ;	      ; = and <
 34336                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34337                                  ;	      ; ? and >
 34338                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34339                                  ;	      ; A - Z
 34340                                  ;	 db   13 dup (0FFh)
 34341                                  ;	      ; \ and [
 34342                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34343                                  ;	      ; ^ and ]
 34344                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34345                                  ;	      ; _ - {
 34346                                  ;	 db   15 dup (0FFh)
 34347                                  ;	      ; } and |
 34348                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34349                                  
 34350                                  ;CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2	; This is the value of the last
 34351                                  ;					; character in the table
 34352                                  
 34353                                  ;FCHK	equ 1		; normal name char, no chks needed
 34354                                  ;FDELIM	equ 2		; is a delimiter
 34355                                  ;FSPCHK	equ 4		; set if character is not a space or equivalent
 34356                                  ;FFCB	equ 8		; is valid in an FCB
 34357                                  
 34358                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34359                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34360                                  ; DOSCODE:8F76h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34361                                  
 34362                                  CharType: ; 63 bytes
 34363 000059AB 6666666606666666                db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 06h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 0-7
 34364 000059B3 6666666666666666        	db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 8-15
 34365 000059BB F8F6FFFFFF4FF46E        	db 0F8h,0F6h,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 4Fh,0F4h, 6Eh ; 16-23
 34366 000059C3 FFFFFFFFFF4444F4        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 44h, 44h,0F4h ; 24-31
 34367 000059CB FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh ; 32-39
 34368 000059D3 FFFFFFFFFF6F66FF        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 6Fh, 66h,0FFh ; 40-47
 34369 000059DB FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh ; 48-55
 34370 000059E3 FFFFFFFFFFFFF4          	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0F4h	   ; 56-62
 34371                                  
 34372                                  CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2
 34373                                  
 34374                                  ; Offset 12CAh of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 34375                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34376                                  ;CharType:
 34377                                  ;       db 0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34378                                  ;	db 0F6h,0F0h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34379                                  ;	db 0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34380                                  ;	db 0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34381                                  ;	db 0F8h,0FFh,0F6h,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34382                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0F4h,0F4h,0FFh,0FEh,0F6h
 34383                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34384                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0F4h,0F4h,0F4h,0F4h,0F4h,0FFh
 34385                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34386                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34387                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34388                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0FFh,0FFh
 34389                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34390                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh
 34391                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh

 34396                                  ;	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh

 34413                                  
 34414                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34415                                  ; DOSCODE:9011h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34416                                  
 34417                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34418                                  ; DOSCODE:8FB5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34419                                  
 34420                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34421                                  ;
 34422                                  ; Procedure Names : GetLet, UCase, GetLet3
 34423                                  ;
 34424                                  ; These routines take a character, convert it to upper case, and check
 34425                                  ; for delimiters.  Three different entry points:
 34426                                  ;	GetLet -  DS:[SI] = character to convert
 34427                                  ;	UCase  -  AL = character to convert
 34428                                  ;	GetLet3 - AL = character
 34429                                  ;		  [BX] = translation table to use
 34430                                  ;
 34431                                  ;	Exit (in all cases) : AL = upper case character
 34432                                  ;			      CY set if char is control char other than TAB
 34433                                  ;			      ZF set if char is a delimiter
 34434                                  ;	Uses : AX, flags
 34435                                  ;
 34436                                  ; NOTE: This routine exists in a fast table lookup version, and a slow
 34437                                  ; inline version.  Return with carry set is only possible in the inline
 34438                                  ; version. The table lookup version is the one in use.
 34439                                  ;
 34440                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34441                                  
 34442                                  ; This entry point has character at [SI]
 34443                                  
 34444                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5517h
 34445                                  GETLET:	
 34446 000059EA AC                      	LODSB
 34447                                  
 34448                                  ; This entry point has character in AL
 34449                                  
 34450                                  	;entry	UCase
 34451                                  UCase:	
 34452                                  	; 09/08/2018
 34453                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5518h
 34454                                  _UCase:
 34455 000059EB 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34456 000059EC BB[7E0B]                	MOV	BX,FILE_UCASE_TAB+2
 34457                                  
 34458                                  ; Convert the character in AL to upper case
 34459                                  
 34460                                  gl_0:
 34461 000059EF 3C61                    	CMP	AL,"a"
 34462 000059F1 7214                    	JB	short gl_2	; Already upper case, go check type
 34463 000059F3 3C7A                    	CMP	AL,"z"
 34464 000059F5 7702                    	JA	short gl_1
 34465 000059F7 2C20                    	SUB	AL,20H		; Convert to upper case
 34466                                  
 34467                                  ; Map European character to upper case
 34468                                  
 34469                                  gl_1:
 34470 000059F9 3C80                    	CMP	AL,80H
 34471 000059FB 720A                    	JB	short gl_2	; Not EuroChar, go check type
 34472 000059FD 2C80                    	SUB	AL,80H		; translate to upper case with this index
 34473                                  
 34474                                  	; M048 - Start 
 34475                                  	; Lantastic call Ucase thru int 2f without setting SS to DOSDATA.
 34476                                  	; So we shall set up DS and to access FILE_UCASE_TAB in BX and also 
 34477                                  	; preserve it.
 34478                                  
 34479                                  	; 09/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34480                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34481                                  	;;XLAT	BYTE [CS:BX]	; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34482                                  	;CS	XLAT
 34483                                  
 34484                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34485                                  
 34486                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34487 000059FF 1E                      	push	ds
 34488                                  	;getdseg <ds>
 34489 00005A00 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 34490 00005A05 D7                      	XLAT			; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34491 00005A06 1F                      	pop	ds
 34492                                  
 34493                                  	; M048 - End
 34494                                  
 34495                                  ; Now check the type
 34496                                  
 34497                                  ;If TableLook
 34498                                  gl_2:
 34499                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34500 00005A07 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34501                                  
 34502                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34503                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34504                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34505                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34506                                  	;cs	xlat	
 34507                                  	
 34508                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34509 00005A08 E81800                  	CALL	GetCharType	; returns type flags in AL
 34510                                  	
 34511                                  	;test	al,1	
 34512 00005A0B A801                    	TEST	AL,FCHK 	; test for normal character
 34513 00005A0D 58                      	POP	AX
 34514                                  
 34515 00005A0E 5B                      	POP	BX
 34516 00005A0F C3                      	RETN
 34517                                  
 34518                                  ; This entry has character in AL and lookup table in BX
 34519                                  
 34520                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34521                                  ;	;entry GetLet3
 34522                                  GETLET3: ; 10/08/2018
 34523 00005A10 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34524 00005A11 EBDC                    	JMP	short gl_0
 34525                                  ;ELSE
 34526                                  ;
 34527                                  ;gl_2:
 34528                                  ;	POP	BX
 34529                                  ;	CMP	AL,"."
 34530                                  ;	retz
 34531                                  ;	CMP	AL,'"'
 34532                                  ;	retz
 34533                                  ;	CALL	PATHCHRCMP
 34534                                  ;	retz
 34535                                  ;	CMP	AL,"["
 34536                                  ;	retz
 34537                                  ;	CMP	AL,"]"
 34538                                  ;	retz
 34539                                  ;ENDIF
 34540                                  
 34541                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
 34542                                  ;
 34543                                  ; DELIM - check if character is a delimiter
 34544                                  ;	Entry : AX = character to check
 34545                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is not a delimiter
 34546                                  ;	Uses  : Flags
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
 34549                                  
 34550                                  	;entry	DELIM
 34551                                  DELIM:
 34552                                  ;IF TableLook
 34553                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34554 00005A13 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34555                                  
 34556                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34557                                  	;push	bx
 34558                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34559                                  	;;09/08/2018
 34560                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34561                                  	;cs	xlat
 34562                                  	;pop	bx
 34563                                  
 34564                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34565 00005A14 E80C00                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34566                                  	
 34567                                  	;test	al,2
 34568 00005A17 A802                    	TEST	AL,FDELIM
 34569 00005A19 58                      	POP	AX
 34570 00005A1A C3                      	RETN
 34571                                  ;ELSE
 34572                                  ;	CMP	AL,":"
 34573                                  ;	retz
 34574                                  ;
 34575                                  ;	CMP	AL,"<"
 34576                                  ;	retz
 34577                                  ;	CMP	AL,"|"
 34578                                  ;	retz
 34579                                  ;	CMP	AL,">"
 34580                                  ;	retz
 34581                                  ;
 34582                                  ;	CMP	AL,"+"
 34583                                  ;	retz
 34584                                  ;	CMP	AL,"="
 34585                                  ;	retz
 34586                                  ;	CMP	AL,";"
 34587                                  ;	retz
 34588                                  ;	CMP	AL,","
 34589                                  ;	retz
 34590                                  ;ENDIF
 34591                                  
 34592                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34593                                  ;
 34594                                  ;  SPCHK - checks to see if a character is a space or equivalent
 34595                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to check
 34596                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is a space
 34597                                  ;	Uses  : flags
 34598                                  ;
 34599                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34600                                  
 34601                                  	;entry SPCHK
 34602                                  SPCHK:
 34603                                  ;IF TableLook
 34604                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34605 00005A1B 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34606                                  
 34607                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34608                                  	;push	bx
 34609                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34610                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34611                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34612                                  	;cs	xlat
 34613                                  	;pop	bx
 34614                                  
 34615                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34616 00005A1C E80400                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34617                                  	
 34618                                  	;test	al,4
 34619 00005A1F A804                    	TEST	AL,FSPCHK
 34620 00005A21 58                      	POP	AX
 34621 00005A22 C3                      	RETN
 34622                                  ;ELSE
 34623                                  ;	CMP	AL,9		; Filter out tabs too
 34624                                  ;	retz
 34625                                  ;; WARNING! " " MUST be the last compare
 34626                                  ;	CMP	AL," "
 34627                                  ;	return
 34628                                  ;ENDIF
 34629                                  
 34630                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34631                                  ;
 34632                                  ;  GetCharType - return flag bits indicating character type
 34633                                  ;	Bits are defined in DOSSYM.INC. Uses lookup table
 34634                                  ;	defined above at label CharType.
 34635                                  ;
 34636                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to return type flags for
 34637                                  ;	Exit  : AL = type flags
 34638                                  ;	Uses  : AL, flags
 34639                                  ;
 34640                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34641                                  
 34642                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34643                                  
 34644                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34645                                  
 34646                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34647                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34648                                  
 34649                                  GetCharType:
 34650                                  	;cmp	al,7Eh
 34651 00005A23 3C7E                    	cmp	al,CharType_last 	; beyond end of table?
 34652 00005A25 7314                    	jae	short gct_90		; return standard value
 34653                                  
 34654 00005A27 53                      	push	bx
 34655 00005A28 BB[AB59]                	mov	bx,CharType		; load lookup table
 34656 00005A2B D0E8                    	shr	al,1			; adjust for half-byte table entry size
 34657                                  	;xlat	cs:[bx] 		; get flags
 34658 00005A2D 2ED7                    	cs	xlat	
 34659 00005A2F 5B                      	pop	bx
 34660                                  
 34661                                  ; carry clear from previous shift means we want the low nibble.  Otherwise
 34662                                  ; we have to shift the flags down to the low nibble
 34663                                  
 34664 00005A30 7306                    	jnc	short gct_80		; carry clear, no shift needed
 34665                                  
 34666                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34667                                  %if 0
 34668                                  	shr	al,1			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34669                                  	shr	al,1
 34670                                  	shr	al,1
 34671                                  	shr	al,1
 34672                                  %else
 34673                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34674                                  	;;;
 34675 00005A32 51                      	push	cx
 34676 00005A33 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34677 00005A35 D2E8                    	shr	al,cl
 34678 00005A37 59                      	pop	cx
 34679                                  	;;;
 34680                                  %endif
 34681                                  
 34682                                  gct_80:
 34683 00005A38 240F                    	and	al,0Fh			; clear the unused nibble
 34684 00005A3A C3                      	retn
 34685                                  gct_90:
 34686 00005A3B B00F                    	mov	al,0Fh			; set all flags
 34687 00005A3D C3                      	retn
 34688                                  
 34689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34690                                  ;
 34691                                  ; Procedure : PATHCHRCMP
 34692                                  ;
 34693                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34694                                  
 34695                                  PATHCHRCMP:
 34696 00005A3E 3C2F                    	CMP	AL,'/'
 34697 00005A40 7606                    	JBE	short PathRet
 34698 00005A42 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 34699 00005A44 C3                      	retn
 34700                                  GotFor:
 34701 00005A45 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 34702 00005A47 C3                      	retn
 34703                                  PathRet:
 34704 00005A48 74FB                    	JZ	short GotFor
 34705 00005A4A C3                      	retn

 34713                                  
 34714                                  ; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11, CTRLC.ASM, 1983)
 34715                                  
 34716                                  ;**	MSCTRLC.ASM - ^C and error handler for MSDOS
 34717                                  
 34718                                  ;	TITLE	Control C detection, Hard error and EXIT routines
 34719                                  ;	NAME	IBMCTRLC
 34720                                  
 34721                                  ;**	Low level routines for detecting special characters on CON input,
 34722                                  ;	the ^C exit/int code, the Hard error INT 24 code, the
 34723                                  ;	process termination code, and the INT 0 divide overflow handler.

 35056                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35057                                  ;
 35058                                  ; Procedure Name : CNTHAND ( CTRLC_C HANDLER )
 35059                                  ;
 35060                                  ; "^C" and CR/LF is printed. Then the user registers are restored and the
 35061                                  ; user CTRL-C handler is executed. At this point the top of the stack has 1)
 35062                                  ; the interrupt return address should the user CTRL-C handler wish to allow
 35063                                  ; processing to continue; 2) the original interrupt return address to the code
 35064                                  ; that performed the function call in the first place. If the user CTRL-C
 35065                                  ; handler wishes to continue, it must leave all registers unchanged and RET
 35066                                  ; (not IRET) with carry CLEAR. If carry is SET then an terminate system call
 35067                                  ; is simulated.
 35068                                  ;
 35069                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35070                                  
 35071                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 35072                                  
 35073                                  CNTCHAND:
 35074                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; SS override
 35075                                  					; AN002; from RAWOUT
 35076                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],CTRL_BREAK_FLAG  
 35077                                  	;JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35078                                  
 35079                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35080                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS DOSCODE:91C4h, 29/12/2022)
 35081 00005B93 36F606[1206]02          	TEST	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(CTRL_BREAK_FLAG>>8)  ; 2 
 35082 00005B99 7508                    	JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35083                                  
 35084 00005B9B B003                            MOV     AL,3			; Display "^C"
 35085 00005B9D E8DBC0                          CALL	BUFOUT
 35086 00005BA0 E870BF                          CALL	CRLF
 35087                                  around_deadlock:
 35088 00005BA3 16                              PUSH    SS
 35089 00005BA4 1F                              POP     DS
 35090 00005BA5 803E[5703]00                    CMP     BYTE [CONSWAP],0
 35091 00005BAA 7403                            JZ      SHORT NOSWAP
 35092 00005BAC E835DE                          CALL	SWAPBACK
 35093                                  NOSWAP:
 35094 00005BAF FA                      	CLI				; Prepare to play with stack
 35095 00005BB0 8E16[8605]              	MOV	SS,[USER_SS]		; User stack now restored
 35096 00005BB4 8B26[8405]              	MOV	SP,[USER_SP]
 35097 00005BB8 E89AA8                          CALL	restore_world       ; User registers now restored
 35098                                  
 35099                                  	; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 
 35100                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56ACh)
 35101                                          ; 14/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 35102                                  	;MOV	BYTE [CS:INDOS],0	
 35103                                          ;MOV	BYTE [CS:ERRORMODE],0
 35104                                          ;MOV	[CS:ConC_Spsave],SP
 35105                                  	;clc	;30/07/2018
 35106                                          ;INT	int_ctrl_c ; 23h    ; Execute user Ctrl-C handler
 35107                                  	;;int	23h	; DOS - CONTROL "C" EXIT ADDRESS
 35108                                  			; Return: return via RETF 2 with CF set
 35109                                  			; DOS will abort program with errorlevel 0
 35110                                  			; else
 35111                                  			; interrupted DOS call continues
 35112                                  
 35113                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35114                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS,91ECh) 
 35115                                  
 35116                                  	; CS was used to address these variables. We have to use DOSDATA
 35117                                  	
 35118 00005BBB 07                      	pop	es ; *	; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS.SYS, DOSCODE:91ECh)
 35119                                  			; (pop es, after 'call restore_world')	
 35120 00005BBC 1E                      	push	ds
 35121                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 35122 00005BBD 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35123 00005BC2 C606[2103]00            	mov	byte [INDOS],0		; Go to known state
 35124                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35125                                  	;;;
 35126 00005BC7 C606[C011]00            	mov	byte [INDOS_FLAG],0	; 2nd 'in dos' flag (what for?)
 35127                                  	;;;
 35128 00005BCC C606[2003]00            	mov	byte [ERRORMODE],0
 35129 00005BD1 8926[3203]              	mov	[ConC_Spsave],SP	; save his SP
 35130                                  	; User SP has changed because of push. Adjust for it
 35131 00005BD5 8306[3203]02            	add	word [ConC_Spsave],2
 35132                                  
 35133 00005BDA 803E[660D]00            	cmp	byte [DosHasHMA],0	; Q: is dos running in HMA (M021)
 35134 00005BDF 1F                       	pop	ds	; restore ds
 35135 00005BE0 7505                    	jne	short do_low_int23	; Y: the int must be done from low mem
 35136 00005BE2 F8                      	CLC				
 35137 00005BE3 CD23                    	INT	int_ctrl_c  ; int 23h	; N: Execute user Ctrl-C handler
 35138 00005BE5 EB06                    	jmp	short ctrlc_ret_addr
 35139                                  
 35140                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35141                                  do_low_int23:
 35142 00005BE7 F8                      	clc
 35143 00005BE8 2EFF1E[4B5A]            	call	far [cs:LowInt23Addr]
 35144                                  
 35145                                  	; 30/07/2018 
 35146                                  
 35147                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56C0h)
 35148                                  
 35149                                  ; The user has returned to us. The circumstances we allow are:
 35150                                  ;
 35151                                  ;   IRET	We retry the operation by redispatching the system call
 35152                                  ;   CLC/RETF	POP the stack and retry
 35153                                  ;   ... 	Exit the current process with ^C exit
 35154                                  ;
 35155                                  ; User's may RETURN to us and leave interrupts on. 
 35156                                  ; Turn 'em off just to be sure
 35157                                  
 35158                                  ctrlc_ret_addr: ; 05/05/2019
 35159                                  
 35160 00005BED FA                      	CLI
 35161                                  
 35162                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 
 35163                                  	;MOV	[CS:USER_IN_AX],ax	; save the AX
 35164                                  	;PUSHF				; and the flags (maybe new call)
 35165                                  	;POP	AX
 35166                                  
 35167                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35168                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35169                                  
 35170                                  	; We have to use DOSDATA for these variables. Previously CS was used 
 35171                                  
 35172 00005BEE 50                      	push	ax
 35173 00005BEF 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 35174                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 35175 00005BF1 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35176 00005BF6 A3[630D]                	mov	[TEMPSEG],ax
 35177 00005BF9 58                      	pop	ax
 35178 00005BFA A3[3A03]                	MOV	[USER_IN_AX],ax		; save the AX
 35179 00005BFD 9C                      	pushf				; and the flags (maybe new call)
 35180 00005BFE 58                      	pop	ax
 35181                                  
 35182                                  ; See if the input stack is identical to the output stack
 35183                                  
 35184                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 35185                                  	;CMP	SP,[CS:ConC_Spsave]
 35186                                  	;JNZ	SHORT ctrlc_try_new	; current SP not the same as saved SP
 35187                                  
 35188                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35189 00005BFF 3B26[3203]              	CMP	SP,[ConC_Spsave]
 35190 00005C03 750A                    	JNZ	SHORT ctrlc_try_new	; current SP not the same as saved SP
 35191                                  
 35192                                  ; Repeat the operation by redispatching the system call.
 35193                                  
 35194                                  ctrlc_repeat:
 35195                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 35196                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:USER_IN_AX]
 35197                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35198                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35199 00005C05 A1[3A03]                	mov	ax,[USER_IN_AX]

 35422                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35423                                  ;
 35424                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErr
 35425                                  ;
 35426                                  ; Hard disk error handler. Entry conditions:
 35427                                  ;	DS:BX = Original disk transfer address
 35428                                  ;	DX = Original logical sector number
 35429                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors to go (first one gave the error)
 35430                                  ;	AX = Hardware error code
 35431                                  ;	DI = Original sector transfer count	
 35432                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 35433                                  ;	[READOP] = 0 for read, 1 for write
 35434                                  ;	Allowed Set with allowed responses to this error (other bits MUST BE 0)
 35435                                  ; Output:
 35436                                  ;	[FAILERR] will be set if user responded FAIL
 35437                                  ;
 35438                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35439                                  
 35440                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35441                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 35443                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35444                                  	; 30/07/2018
 35445                                  	; 08/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 35450                                  	;cmp	di,0

 35456                                  	;;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+0]

 35500 00005CF1 7504                    	jnz	short TESTDIR1	; Err in FAT must force recomp of freespace

 35587                                  ;	EXITHOLD set for restore of ES:BP.

 35601                                  	; Wango!!! We may need to free some user state info... In 
 35602                                  	; particular, we may have locked down a JFN for a user and he may

 35604                                  	; reallocate it when we come back.

 35650 00005DA5 EB05                    	jmp	short criterr_ret_addr

 35745                                  DoAbort:

 35748

 35754                                  	; turn this abort into a fail.

 35766                                  
 35767                                  	; we are truly aborting the process. Go restore information from 
 35768                                  	; the PDB as necessary.
 35769                                  
 35770 00005E40 E95410                  	jmp	exit_inner
 35771                                  
 35772                                  ;** --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35773                                  ;
 35774                                  ; reset_environment checks the DS value against the CurrentPDB. If they are
 35775                                  ; different, then an old-style return is performed. If they are the same,
 35776                                  ; then we release jfns and restore to parent. We still use the PDB at DS:0 as
 35777                                  ; the source of the terminate addresses.
 35778                                  ;
 35779                                  ; Some subtlety: We are about to issue a bunch of calls that *may* generate
 35780                                  ; INT 24s. We *cannot* allow the user to restart the abort process; we may
 35781                                  ; end up aborting the wrong process or turn a terminate/stay/resident into a
 35782                                  ; normal abort and leave interrupt handlers around. What we do is to set a
 35783                                  ; flag that will indicate that if any abort code is seen, we just continue the
 35784                                  ; operation. In essence, we dis-allow the abort response.
 35785                                  ;
 35786                                  ; output:   none.
 35787                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35788                                  
 35789                                  	;entry	reset_environment
 35790                                  	
 35791                                  reset_environment:
 35792                                  	; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 35793                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 588Ah 
 35794                                  
 35795                                  ;***	invoke	Reset_Version		; AN007 ;MS. reset version number
 35796                                  
 35797 00005E43 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; save PDB of process
 35798                                  
 35799                                  	; There are no critical sections in force. Although we may enter
 35800                                  	; here with critical sections locked down, they are no longer 
 35801                                  	; relevant. We may safely free all allocated resources.
 35802                                  
 35803 00005E44 B482                    	MOV	AH,82h
 35804                                  		; Microsoft Networks - END DOS CRITICAL SECTIONS 0 THROUGH 7
 35805                                  	;int	2Ah 	
 35806 00005E46 CD2A                    	INT	int_IBM
 35807                                  
 35808                                  					; SS override
 35809 00005E48 36C606[5903]FF          	MOV	byte [SS:fAborting],-1	; signal abort in progress
 35810                                  
 35811                                  					; DOS 4.00 doesn't need it
 35812                                  	;CallInstall NetResetEnvironment, MultNET, 34  
 35813                                  					; Allow REDIR to clear some stuff
 35814                                  					; On process exit.
 35815 00005E4E B82211                  	mov	ax, 1122h
 35816 00005E51 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - PROCESS TERMINATION HOOK
 35817                                  			; SS = DOS CS
 35818                                  	;mov	al,22h	
 35819 00005E53 B022                    	MOV	AL,int_terminate
 35820 00005E55 E802B1                  	call	_$GET_INTERRUPT_VECTOR	; and who to go to
 35821

 35829

 35832                                  	; is not Exit_keep_process

 35839                                  
 35840                                  					; SS override
 35841                                  	;cmp	byte [SS:EXIT_TYPE],3

 35843 00005E74 7406                    	JZ	short reset_to_parent 	; keeping this process
 35844                                  
 35845                                  	; We are truly removing a process. Free all allocation blocks
 35846                                  	; belonging to this PDB
 35847                                  
 35848                                  	;invoke	arena_free_process
 35849 00005E76 E85D10                  	call	arena_free_process
 35850                                  
 35851                                  	; Kill off remainder of this process. Close file handles and signal
 35852                                  	; to relevant network folks that this process is dead. Remember that
 35853                                  	; CurrentPDB is STILL the current process!
 35854                                  
 35855                                  	;invoke	DOS_ABORT
 35856 00005E79 E81BD7                  	call	DOS_ABORT
 35857                                  
 35858                                  reset_to_parent:
 35859                                  					; SS override
 35860 00005E7C 368F06[3003]            	POP	word [SS:CurrentPDB]	; set up process as parent
 35861                                  
 35862                                  reset_return:				; come here for normal return
 35863                                  	;Context DS			; DS is used to refer to DOSDATA

 35870                                  	; we cannot "FAIL" the abort, the program being aborted is dead.

 35957                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35958                                  ;
 35959                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_I24_EXTENDED_ERROR
 35960                                  ;
 35961                                  ; This routine handles extended error codes.
 35962                                  ; Input : DI = error code from device
 35963                                  ; Output: All EXTERR fields are set
 35964                                  ;
 35965                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35966                                  
 35967                                  SET_I24_EXTENDED_ERROR:
 35968 00005EE5 50                      	PUSH	AX
 35969                                  					; ErrMap24End is in DOSDATA
 35970 00005EE6 B8[BB0E]                	MOV	AX,ErrMap24End
 35971 00005EE9 2D[AB0E]                	SUB	AX,ErrMap24
 35972                                  					; Change to dosdata to access
 35973                                  					; ErrMap24 and EXTERR -SR
 35974                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35975                                  	
 35976                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35977 00005EEC 1E                      	push	ds
 35978                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds ->dosdata
 35979 00005EED 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35980                                  
 35981                                  	; AX is the index of the first unavailable error. Do not translate
 35982                                  	; if greater or equal to AX.
 35983                                  
 35984 00005EF2 39C7                    	CMP	DI,AX
 35985 00005EF4 89F8                    	MOV	AX,DI
 35986 00005EF6 7306                    	JAE	short NoTrans
 35987                                  
 35988                                  	;MOV	AL,[CS:DI+ErrMap24]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 35989 00005EF8 8A85[AB0E]              	mov	al,[ErrMap24+di] ; MSDOS 6.0

 35999                                  	; error locus class and recommended action.

 36003 00005F04 BE[5B0E]                	MOV	SI,ERR_TABLE_24
